scripts.watch: cd src && npx tsx watch app
scripts.reset: npx prisma db push --force-reset && npx cpr src/app.db bin/app.db -o
scripts.build-win: npx cpr lib/query_engine-windows.dll.node out/prisma.node -o && npx pkg . -t node22-win-x64 -o bin/app -C Brotli
scripts.build-mac: npx cpr lib/libquery_engine-darwin.dylib.node out/prisma.node -o && npx pkg . -t node22-macos-x64 -o bin/app -C Brotli
scripts.build-rhl: npx cpr lib/libquery_engine-rhel-openssl-3.0.x.so.node out/prisma.node -o && npx pkg . -t node22-linux-x64 -o bin/app -C Brotli
scripts.build-deb: npx cpr lib/libquery_engine-debian-openssl-3.0.x.so.node out/prisma.node -o && npx pkg . -t node22-linux-x64 -o bin/app -C Brotli
